summary: This is an email chain from September 30, 2020, regarding coordination for foreign travel and a meeting related to a witness in the Epstein case. The email indicates O1A concurrence has been received and UK approvals are being worked on, with communication involving an attorney representing the witness.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Recipient of a draft email being discussed between the correspondents regarding foreign travel and witness meeting coordination.

events.title: Coordination for Foreign Travel and Witness Meeting
events.description: Email correspondence discussing draft travel memo, O1A concurrence, UK approvals, and coordination with an attorney representing a witness to set meeting dates.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 30, 2020, concerning foreign travel and a meeting related to a witness in the Epstein case.
